name: Annual
description:
This is a classic FPS with all the 90's feel. You are a survivor of a space expedition trying to survive the alien threats at all costs. As you awake from a stasis chamber with only a blaster. Will you survive the horde or become another casualty?

Features:

- A sandbox world to expore.

- Fast and fluid FPS gameplay.

- Lots and lots and lots of enemies to kill.
